get.description: Fetches lists of comics with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Filter by the issue format (e.g. comic, digital comic, hardcover).

parameters.name: formatType
parameters.description: Filter by the issue format type (comic or collection).

parameters.name: noVariants
parameters.description: Exclude variants (alternate covers, secondary printings, director's cuts, etc.) from the result set.

parameters.name: dateDescriptor
parameters.description: Return comics within a predefined date range.

parameters.name: dateRange
parameters.description: Return comics within a predefined date range.  Dates must be specified as date1,date2 (e.g. 2013-01-01,2013-01-02).  Dates are preferably formatted as YYYY-MM-DD but may be sent as any common date format.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Return only issues in series whose title matches the input.

parameters.name: titleStartsWith
parameters.description: Return only issues in series whose title starts with the input.

parameters.name: startYear
parameters.description: Return only issues in series whose start year matches the input.

parameters.name: issueNumber
parameters.description: Return only issues in series whose issue number matches the input.

parameters.name: diamondCode
parameters.description: Filter by diamond code.

parameters.name: digitalId
parameters.description: Filter by digital comic id.

parameters.name: upc
parameters.description: Filter by UPC.

parameters.name: isbn
parameters.description: Filter by ISBN.

parameters.name: ean
parameters.description: Filter by EAN.

parameters.name: issn
parameters.description: Filter by ISSN.

parameters.name: hasDigitalIssue
parameters.description: Include only results which are available digitally.

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: Return only comics which have been modified since the specified date.

parameters.name: creators
parameters.description: Return only comics which feature work by the specified creators (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

parameters.name: characters
parameters.description: Return only comics which feature the specified characters (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

parameters.name: series
parameters.description: Return only comics which are part of the specified series (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

parameters.name: events
parameters.description: Return only comics which take place in the specified events (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

parameters.name: stories
parameters.description: Return only comics which contain the specified stories (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

parameters.name: sharedAppearances
parameters.description: Return only comics in which the specified characters appear together (for example in which BOTH Spider-Man and Wolverine appear). Accepts a comma-separated list of ids.

parameters.name: collaborators
parameters.description: Return only comics in which the specified creators worked together (for example in which BOTH Stan Lee and Jack Kirby did work). Accepts a comma-separated list of ids.

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Order the result set by a field or fields. Add a "-" to the value sort in descending order. Multiple values are given priority in the order in which they are passed.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the result set to the specified number of resources.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Skip the specified number of resources in the result set.

get.summary: Fetches a single comic by id.
get.description: This method fetches a single comic resource.  It is the canonical URI for any comic resource provided by the API.

parameters.name: comicId
parameters.description: A single comic.

get.summary: Fetches lists of creators filtered by a comic id.
get.description: Fetches lists of comic creators whose work appears in a specific comic, with optional filters. See notes on individual parameters below.

parameters.name: comicId
parameters.description: The comic id.

parameters.name: firstName
parameters.description: Filter by creator first name (e.g. brian).

parameters.name: middleName
parameters.description: Filter by creator middle name (e.g. Michael).

parameters.name: lastName
parameters.description: Filter by creator last name (e.g. Bendis).

parameters.name: suffix
parameters.description: Filter by suffix or honorific (e.g. Jr., Sr.).

parameters.name: nameStartsWith
parameters.description: Filter by creator names that match critera (e.g. B, St L).

parameters.name: firstNameStartsWith
parameters.description: Filter by creator first names that match critera (e.g. B, St L).

parameters.name: middleNameStartsWith
parameters.description: Filter by creator middle names that match critera (e.g. Mi).

parameters.name: lastNameStartsWith
parameters.description: Filter by creator last names that match critera (e.g. Ben).

parameters.name: modifiedSince
parameters.description: Return only creators which have been modified since the specified date.

parameters.name: comics
parameters.description: Return only creators who worked on in the specified comics (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

parameters.name: series
parameters.description: Return only creators who worked on the specified series (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

parameters.name: stories
parameters.description: Return only creators who worked on the specified stories (accepts a comma-separated list of ids).

parameters.name: orderBy
parameters.description: Order the result set by a field or fields. Add a "-" to the value sort in descending order. Multiple values are given priority in the order in which they are passed.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the result set to the specified number of resources.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Skip the specified number of resources in the result set.

available.description: The number of total available series in this list. Will always be greater than or equal to the "returned" value.

returned.description: The number of series returned in this collection (up to 20).

collectionURI.description: The path to the full list of series in this collection.

items.description: The list of returned series in this collection.

available.description: The number of total available creators in this list. Will always be greater than or equal to the "returned" value.

returned.description: The number of creators returned in this collection (up to 20).

collectionURI.description: The path to the full list of creators in this collection.

items.description: The list of returned creators in this collection.

offset.description: The requested offset (number of skipped results) of the call.

total.description: The total number of resources available given the current filter set.

count.description: The total number of results returned by this call.

results.description: The list of comics returned by the call

id.description: The unique ID of the creator resource.

firstName.description: The first name of the creator.

middleName.description: The middle name of the creator.

lastName.description: The last name of the creator.

suffix.description: The suffix or honorific for the creator.

fullName.description: The full name of the creator (a space-separated concatenation of the above four fields).

modified.description: The date the resource was most recently modified.

resourceURI.description: The canonical URL identifier for this resource.

urls.description: A set of public web site URLs for the resource.

thumbnail.description: The representative image for this creator.

series.description: A resource list containing the series which feature work by this creator.

stories.description: A resource list containing the stories which feature work by this creator.

comics.description: A resource list containing the comics which feature work by this creator.

events.description: A resource list containing the events which feature work by this creator.

path.description: The directory path of to the image.

extension.description: The file extension for the image.

type.description: A text identifier for the URL.

url.description: A full URL (including scheme, domain, and path).

offset.description: The requested offset (number of skipped results) of the call.

total.description: The total number of resources available given the current filter set.

count.description: The total number of results returned by this call.

results.description: The list of characters returned by the call.

type.description: A description of the date (e.g. onsale date, FOC date).

offset.description: The requested offset (number of skipped results) of the call.

total.description: The total number of resources available given the current filter set.

count.description: The total number of results returned by this call.

results.description: The list of series returned by the call

id.description: The unique ID of the story resource.

description.description: A short description of the story.

resourceURI.description: The canonical URL identifier for this resource.

type.description: The story type e.g. interior story, cover, text story.

modified.description: The date the resource was most recently modified.

thumbnail.description: The representative image for this story.

comics.description: A resource list containing comics in which this story takes place.

series.description: A resource list containing series in which this story appears.

events.description: A resource list of the events in which this story appears.

characters.description: A resource list of characters which appear in this story.

creators.description: A resource list of creators who worked on this story.

originalissue.description: A summary representation of the issue in which this story was originally published.

code.description: The HTTP status code of the returned result.

status.description: A string description of the call status.

copyright.description: The copyright notice for the returned result.

attributionText.description: The attribution notice for this result.  Please display either this notice or the contents of the attributionHTML field on all screens which contain data from the Marvel Comics API.

attributionHTML.description: An HTML representation of the attribution notice for this result.  Please display either this notice or the contents of the attributionText field on all screens which contain data from the Marvel Comics API.

data.description: The results returned by the call.

etag.description: A digest value of the content returned by the call.

id.description: The unique ID of the comic resource.

digitalId.description: The ID of the digital comic representation of this comic. Will be 0 if the comic is not available digitally.

title.description: The canonical title of the comic.

issueNumber.description: The number of the issue in the series (will generally be 0 for collection formats).

variantDescription.description: If the issue is a variant (e.g. an alternate cover, second printing, or directorâ€™s cut), a text description of the variant.

description.description: The preferred description of the comic.

modified.description: The date the resource was most recently modified.

isbn.description: The ISBN for the comic (generally only populated for collection formats).

upc.description: The UPC barcode number for the comic (generally only populated for periodical formats).

diamondCode.description: The Diamond code for the comic.

ean.description: The EAN barcode for the comic.

issn.description: The ISSN barcode for the comic.

format.description: The publication format of the comic e.g. comic, hardcover, trade paperback.

pageCount.description: The number of story pages in the comic.

textObjects.description: A set of descriptive text blurbs for the comic.

resourceURI.description: The canonical URL identifier for this resource.

urls.description: A set of public web site URLs for the resource.

series.description: A summary representation of the series to which this comic belongs.

variants.description: A list of variant issues for this comic (includes the "original" issue if the current issue is a variant).

collections.description: A list of collections which include this comic (will generally be empty if the comic's format is a collection).

collectedIssues.description: A list of issues collected in this comic (will generally be empty for periodical formats such as "comic" or "magazine").

dates.description: A list of key dates for this comic.

prices.description: A list of prices for this comic.

thumbnail.description: The representative image for this comic.

images.description: A list of promotional images associated with this comic.

creators.description: A resource list containing the creators associated with this comic.

characters.description: A resource list containing the characters which appear in this comic.

stories.description: A resource list containing the stories which appear in this comic.

events.description: A resource list containing the events in which this comic appears.

offset.description: The requested offset (number of skipped results) of the call.

total.description: The total number of resources available given the current filter set.

count.description: The total number of results returned by this call.

results.description: The list of creators returned by the call.

resourceURI.description: The path to the individual series resource.

name.description: The canonical name of the series.

resourceURI.description: The path to the individual creator resource.

name.description: The full name of the creator.

role.description: The role of the creator in the parent entity.

resourceURI.description: The path to the individual character resource.

name.description: The full name of the character.

role.description: The role of the creator in the parent entity.

previous.description: A summary representation of the series which preceded this series.
